item.title: #TIL 2018-03-01 : web, sysadmin, http, til, security, hacking, browser
item.description: WEB Sending Cookie in AJAX CORs request By default, browser will remove the cookie and authorization header from AJAX CORs request. So before sending out the request, make sure withCredentials must be true. In this case, CORs response must specify which origin is allowed (mean no wildcard allowed origin rule). SYSADMIN Prevent source hacking from .git directory exposing Many web project use Git as source version control tools. So in production server, we could expose the hidden .
